document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">As </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">if </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">some </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">little </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">Arctic </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d440ff">flower </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Opon </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c68ff">polar </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b4d0b4">hem </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Went </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#60c8ff">wandering </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">down </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#84c4e0">Latitudes </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Until </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0ff9e">puzzled </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">came </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7078ff">continents </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">summer </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">firmaments </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">sun </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8474ff">strange, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">bright </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cffa6">crowds </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">flowers </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">birds, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#3cff70">foreign </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0e05c">tongue! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">say, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">As </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">if </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">this </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">little </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a060c4">flower </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#7078ff">Eden, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c68ff">wandered </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">What </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">then? </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Why </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">nothing, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Only, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">your </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#4c68ff">inference </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cffa6">therefrom! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: As if some little Arctic flower
